<MethodEndpoint method={'delete'} path={'/tools/{id}'} context={'endpoint'}></MethodEndpoint>

Delete a specific tool by ID

<Heading id={'request'} as={'h2'} className={'openapi-tabs__heading'} children={'Request'}></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
    parameters={[{ in: 'path', name: 'id', required: true, schema: { type: 'string' }, description: 'Tool ID' }]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

    id={undefined}

    responses={{
